input.sentences: the students were very excited for the tournament match .
these basketball players practiced long and hard for this moment .
the student tried for a layup shot that was crucial to tying the game .
the home team was delivering magnificent defense .

output.sentences: The students of Carter High made it to the last match in the tournament.
The players practiced all season long to get to this moment.
Tim, a student from Carter High, made a shot in the last second tying the score.
The home team played a magnificent game against a very hard team.
Carter High won the tournament even though it was a hard, not just because they are skilled but because of their amazing team spirit.
